00035 typedef struct {
00036   int ncluster;
00037   char (*clusterfname)[255];
00038   char (*clusterfmd5hash)[255];
00039   SlaterDet* cluster;
00040   int* ng;
00041   int* idx;
00042   int* xi;              
00043 } ClusterFMDInternals;

00045 
00046 Parameterization ParameterizationClusterFMD = {
00047   name : "ClusterFMD",
00048   Pararead : ClusterFMDread,
00049   Parawrite : ClusterFMDwrite,
00050   Paraclone : ClusterFMDclone,
00051   ParainitSlaterDet : ClusterFMDinitSlaterDet,
00052   ParatoSlaterDet : ClusterFMDtoSlaterDet,
00053   ParaprojectgradSlaterDet : ClusterFMDprojectgradSlaterDet
00054 };

00057 // number of parameters for Cluster (position + orientation)
00058 #define NCLUSTER 6
00059 
00060 // number of real parameter of a Gaussian
00061 #define NGAUSS 12

00063 
00064 void ClusterFMDclone(const Para* q, Para* qp)
00065 {
00066   int i;
00067 
00068   strcpy(qp->name, q->name);
00069   qp->A = q->A; qp->Z = q->Z; qp->N = q->N;
00070   qp->n = q->n;
00071 
00072   qp->x = malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00073   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00074     qp->x[i] = q->x[i];
00075 
00076   qp->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00077   qp->internals = malloc(sizeof(ClusterFMDInternals));
00078   ClusterFMDInternals *qpint = qp->internals;
00079   ClusterFMDInternals *qint = q->internals;
00080 
00081   qpint->ncluster = qint->ncluster;
00082   qpint->clusterfname = malloc(qint->ncluster*255*sizeof(char));
00083   qpint->clusterfmd5hash = malloc(qint->ncluster*255*sizeof(char));
00084   for (i=0; i<qint->ncluster; i++) {
00085     strcpy(qpint->clusterfname[i], qint->clusterfname[i]);
00086     strcpy(qpint->clusterfmd5hash[i], qint->clusterfmd5hash[i]);
00087   }
00088 
00089   qpint->cluster = malloc(qint->ncluster*sizeof(SlaterDet));
00090   for (i=0; i<qint->ncluster; i++)
00091     cloneSlaterDet(&qint->cluster[i], &qpint->cluster[i]);
00092 
00093   qpint->ng = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00094   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
00095     qpint->ng[i] = qint->ng[i];
00096   qpint->idx = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00097   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
00098     qpint->idx[i] = qint->idx[i];
00099   qpint->xi = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00100   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
00101     qpint->xi[i] = qint->xi[i];
00102 }

00107 int ClusterFMDread(FILE* fp, Para* q)
00108 {
00109   char buf[BUFSIZE];
00110   int i,k;
00111   ClusterFMDInternals* qint;
00112 
00113   qint = q->internals = malloc(sizeof(ClusterFMDInternals));
00114                                         
00115   do
00116     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00117   while (strncmp(buf, "<Para ", 5) && !feof(fp));
00118   if (feof(fp)) {
00119     fprintf(stderr, "did't find <Para ...>\n");
00120     return -1;
00121   }
00122   
00123   char Pname[80], qname[80];
00124 
00125   sscanf(buf, "<Para %s %s>", Pname, qname);
00126   if (strcmp(Pname, "ClusterFMD")) {
00127     fprintf(stderr, "not a ClusterFMD parameter set\n");
00128     return -1;
00129   }
00130   strcpy(q->name, stripstr(qname, ">"));
00131 
00132   // read clusters
00133   int ncluster;
00134 
00135   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00136   if(sscanf(buf, "<Clusters %d>", &ncluster) != 1) {
00137     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00138     return -1;
00139   }
00140   qint->ncluster = ncluster;
00141   qint->clusterfname = malloc(ncluster*255*sizeof(char));
00142   qint->clusterfmd5hash = malloc(ncluster*255*sizeof(char));
00143   qint->cluster = malloc(ncluster*sizeof(SlaterDet));
00144 
00145   double clusterx[ncluster][6];
00146   for (i=0; i<ncluster; i++) {
00147     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00148     if (sscanf(buf, "<Cluster (%lf, %lf, %lf) (%lf, %lf, %lf) %s %s>",
00149                &clusterx[i][0], &clusterx[i][1], &clusterx[i][2],
00150                &clusterx[i][3], &clusterx[i][4], &clusterx[i][5],
00151                qint->clusterfname[i], qint->clusterfmd5hash[i]) != 8) {
00152       fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00153       return -1;
00154     }
00155     if (strncmp(qint->clusterfmd5hash[i], md5hash(qint->clusterfname[i]), 32)) {
00156       fprintf(stderr, "...  SlaterDetFile does not match with existing hash\n");
00157       return -1;
00158     }
00159     if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&qint->cluster[i], qint->clusterfname[i]))
00160       return -1;
00161   }
00162 
00163   // read nucleon parameters
00164   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00165   if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d %d", &q->A, &q->Z, &q->N) != 3) {
00166     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00167     return -1;
00168   }
00169   if (q->A != q->Z+q->N) {
00170     fprintf(stderr, "proton and neutron number don't sum up in line\n>>%s<<\n",
00171             stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00172     return -1;
00173   }
00174   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00175   if (sscanf(buf, "%d", &q->ngauss) != 1) {
00176     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00177     return -1;
00178   }
00179 
00180   qint->idx = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00181   qint->ng = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00182   qint->xi = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00183   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++) {
00184     qint->idx[i] = 0;
00185     qint->ng[i] = 0;
00186     qint->xi[i] = 0;
00187   }
00188   
00189   q->n = q->ngauss*NGAUSS+ncluster*NCLUSTER;
00190 
00191   q->x = malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00192 
00193   for (k=0; k<ncluster; k++)
00194     for (i=0; i<NCLUSTER; i++)
00195       q->x[i+k*NCLUSTER] = clusterx[k][i];
00196 
00197   int nclust = ncluster*NCLUSTER;
00198   int xi;
00199   double chi0re, chi0im, chi1re, chi1im;
00200   double are, aim, b0re, b0im, b1re, b1im, b2re, b2im; 
00201   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++) {
00202     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00203     if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d "
00204                "(%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf)", 
00205                &k, &xi, &chi0re, &chi0im, &chi1re, &chi1im, 
00206                &are, &aim, &b0re, &b0im, &b1re, &b1im, &b2re, &b2im) != 14) {
00207       fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", 
00208               stripstr(buf,"\n"));
00209       return -1;
00210     }
00211     qint->ng[k]++;
00212     qint->xi[k] = xi;
00213     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0+nclust] = chi0re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1+nclust] = chi0im;
00214     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2+nclust] = chi1re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3+nclust] = chi1im;
00215     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4+nclust] = are;    q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5+nclust] = aim;
00216     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6+nclust] = b0re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7+nclust] = b0im;
00217     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8+nclust] = b1re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9+nclust] = b1im;
00218     q->x[i*NGAUSS+10+nclust] = b2re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+11+nclust] = b2im;
00219   }     
00220   for (k=1; k<q->A; k++) 
00221     qint->idx[k] = qint->idx[k-1]+qint->ng[k-1];
00222 
00223   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00224   if (strncmp(buf, "</Para>", 7)) {
00225     fprintf(stderr, "didn't find </Para>\n");
00226     return -1;
00227   }     
00228 
00229   return 0;
00230 }

00233 int ClusterFMDwrite(FILE* fp, const Para* q)
00234 {
00235   int k, ki, i;
00236   ClusterFMDInternals* qint = q->internals;
00237 
00238   fprintf(fp, "<Para ClusterFMD %s>\n", q->name);
00239 
00240   fprintf(fp, "<Clusters %d>\n", qint->ncluster);
00241 
00242   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00243     fprintf(fp, "<Cluster (%12.8f, %12.8f, %12.8f) (%12.8f, %12.8f, %12.8f) %s %s\n", 
00244             q->x[0+k*NCLUSTER], q->x[1+k*NCLUSTER], q->x[2+k*NCLUSTER],
00245             q->x[3+k*NCLUSTER], q->x[4+k*NCLUSTER], q->x[5+k*NCLUSTER],
00246             qint->clusterfname[k], qint->clusterfmd5hash[k]);
00247   }
00248 
00249   fprintf(fp, "%d %d %d\n", q->A, q->Z, q->N);
00250   fprintf(fp, "%d\n", q->ngauss);
00251 
00252   int nclust = qint->ncluster*NCLUSTER;
00253 
00254   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00255     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++) {
00256       i = qint->idx[k]+ki;
00257       fprintf(fp,
00258               "%2d  %+2d  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)  (%12.8f,%12.8f)  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)\n",
00259               k, qint->xi[k],
00260               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0+nclust], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1+nclust],
00261               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2+nclust], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3+nclust],
00262               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4+nclust], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5+nclust],
00263               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6+nclust], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7+nclust],
00264               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8+nclust], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9+nclust],
00265               q->x[i*NGAUSS+10+nclust], q->x[i*NGAUSS+11+nclust]);
00266   }
00267   fprintf(fp, "</Para>\n");
00268 
00269   return 0;
00270 }

00273 void ClusterFMDinitSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00274 {
00275   int k, ki, in;
00276   ClusterFMDInternals* qint = q->internals;
00277 
00278   Q->A = q->A; Q->Z = q->Z; Q->N = q->N; Q->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00279   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00280     Q->A += qint->cluster[k].A; 
00281     Q->Z += qint->cluster[k].Z; 
00282     Q->N += qint->cluster[k].N;
00283     Q->ngauss += qint->cluster[k].ngauss;
00284   }
00285 
00286   // collect ngs
00287   Q->ng = malloc(Q->A*sizeof(int));
00288   in=0;
00289   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00290     for (ki=0; ki<qint->cluster[k].A; ki++) {
00291       Q->ng[in] = qint->cluster[k].ng[ki];
00292       in++;
00293     }
00294   }
00295   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00296     Q->ng[in+k] = qint->ng[k];
00297 
00298   // build idx from ng
00299   Q->idx = malloc(Q->A*sizeof(int));
00300   Q->idx[0] = 0;
00301   for (k=1; k<Q->A; k++)
00302     Q->idx[k] = Q->idx[k-1]+Q->ng[k-1];
00303 
00304   // set xi of Gaussians
00305   Q->G = (Gaussian*) malloc(Q->ngauss*sizeof(Gaussian));
00306   in=0;
00307   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00308     for (ki=0; ki<qint->cluster[k].ngauss; ki++) {
00309       Q->G[in].xi = qint->cluster[k].G[ki].xi;
00310       in++;
00311     }
00312   }
00313   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++) 
00314     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++)
00315       Q->G[in + qint->idx[k]+ki].xi = qint->xi[k]; 
00316 
00317 }

00320 void ClusterFMDtoSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00321 {
00322   ClusterFMDInternals* qint = q->internals;
00323 
00324   int i,k;
00325   double* euler;
00326   double* pos;
00327   complex double R2[2][2];
00328   double R3[3][3];
00329 
00330   // the clusters
00331   int gi = 0;
00332   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00333     pos = &q->x[0+k*NCLUSTER];
00334     euler = &q->x[3+k*NCLUSTER];
00335     rotatemat2(euler, R2);
00336     rotatemat3(euler, R3);
00337     for (i=0; i<qint->cluster[k].ngauss; i++) {
00338       Q->G[gi] = qint->cluster[k].G[i];
00339       rotateGaussian(&Q->G[gi], R3, R2);
00340       moveGaussian(&Q->G[gi], pos);
00341       gi++;
00342     }
00343   }
00344 
00345   // the nucleons
00346   int nclust = qint->ncluster*NCLUSTER;
00347   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++) {
00348     Q->G[gi+i].chi[0] = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0+nclust] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1+nclust];
00349     Q->G[gi+i].chi[1] = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2+nclust] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3+nclust];
00350     Q->G[gi+i].a      = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4+nclust] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5+nclust];
00351     Q->G[gi+i].b[0]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6+nclust] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7+nclust];
00352     Q->G[gi+i].b[1]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8+nclust] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9+nclust];
00353     Q->G[gi+i].b[2]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+10+nclust] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+11+nclust];
00354   }
00355 }

00358 void ClusterFMDprojectgradSlaterDet(const Para* q,
00359                                     const gradSlaterDet* dQ, double* dq)
00360 {
00361   ClusterFMDInternals* qint = q->internals;
00362 
00363   int i,j,k,ki,gk;
00364   double* euler;
00365   complex double drotmat2[3][2][2];
00366   double drotmat3[3][3][3];
00367   
00368 
00369   complex double dchidang[2];
00370   complex double dbdang[3];
00371   // gradients with respect to clusters
00372   gk=0;
00373   for (k=0; k<qint->ncluster; k++) {
00374     for (i=0; i<NCLUSTER; i++)
00375       dq[i+k*NCLUSTER] = 0.0;
00376 
00377     // derivatives of the rotation matrices
00378     euler = &q->x[3+k*NCLUSTER];
00379     derivrotatemat2(euler, drotmat2);
00380     derivrotatemat3(euler, drotmat3);
00381 
00382     for (ki=0; ki<qint->cluster[k].ngauss; ki++) {
00383 
00384       // derivatives with respect to position
00385       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00386         dq[i+k*NCLUSTER] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk].b[i]);
00387 
00388       // derivatives with respect to angles
00389       for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00390         for (j=0; j<2; j++)
00391         dchidang[j] = qint->cluster[k].G[ki].chi[j];
00392         cm2mult(drotmat2[i], dchidang);
00393         for (j=0; j<2; j++)
00394           dq[3+i+k*NCLUSTER] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk].chi[j]*conj(dchidang[j]));
00395         for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00396           dbdang[j] = qint->cluster[k].G[ki].b[j];
00397         m3mult(drotmat3[i], dbdang);
00398         for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00399           dq[3+i+k*NCLUSTER] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk].b[j]*conj(dbdang[j]));
00400       }
00401       gk++;
00402     }
00403   }
00404 
00405   // gradients with respect to nucleons
00406   int nclust = qint->ncluster*NCLUSTER;
00407   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++) {
00408     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 0+nclust] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk+i].chi[0]);
00409     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 1+nclust] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[gk+i].chi[0]);
00410     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 2+nclust] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk+i].chi[1]);
00411     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 3+nclust] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[gk+i].chi[1]);
00412     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 4+nclust] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk+i].a);
00413     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 5+nclust] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[gk+i].a);
00414     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 6+nclust] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk+i].b[0]);
00415     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 7+nclust] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[gk+i].b[0]);
00416     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 8+nclust] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk+i].b[1]);
00417     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 9+nclust] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[gk+i].b[1]);
00418     dq[i*NGAUSS+10+nclust] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[gk+i].b[2]);
00419     dq[i*NGAUSS+11+nclust] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[gk+i].b[2]);
00420   }
00421 }
